Black Poplar Trees found in QMUL!

While taking a stroll on the QMUL campus, we stumbled upon a beautiful grove of trees, each one unique in its own way.

Third year Geography student Gurapti was honored with the Gold Green Impact Award for demonstrating exceptional leadership skills in coordinating sustainability efforts on campus, inspiring others to join the cause.
